person.persName: John C. Morton (Ohio county bank teller)

body.p: Hartford, Kentucky, banker. Kentucky native. Son of Isaac Morton and Sarah H. Morton. Married Jennie Chinn Morton in 1860. Cashier of the Branch of the People's Bank of Kentucky in Hartford in 1860.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ohio County, Town of Hartford, p. 198; KYR-0001-017-0041; Finding Aid to Jennie Chinn Morton Diary, 1893, SC 4, Martin F. Schmidt Research Library, Kentucky Historical Society, Frankfort, KY.
